name: T - Luna Marica
_source: speak;Luna; Woah, you look like a real soldier. Are you newly trained like me?
speak;Marica; I'm not newly trained, and I'm not some pegasus knight.{w} I'm a pikeman.
speak;Luna; Hm{tgm}...{tgm}you actually look more like a foot soldier with a lance.
speak;Luna; Hehe, relax. I'm just joking around.
speak;Marica; Since you're so funny, you can joke around with all the other little girls.{w} Come back to the battlefield when you're ready to be a real woman.
speak;Luna; Hmph, who put spiders in her armor?
